Hero.title: BUILD WEB3 WITH __ FRIENDS
Hero.subtitle:
AIWeb3 is committed to supporting content creators and establishing the most fantastic and loving Web3 community. 
 Building communities and sharing the latest developments for various Polkadot ecosystem projects, thus advancing the growth of Dotsama. 
 With our unique X2Earn model, content creators can earn points by producing high-quality content 
 while ordinary users can earn points for free by being active in the community, supporting our works, participating in our events, and so on, all of which are rewarded.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: To create a vibrant and supportive ecosystem that empowers Chinese content creators within the Web3 space, fostering a community that thrives on love, collaboration, and mutual support.

parteners.title: Our Partners
parteners.subtitle:
Were proud to partner with some of the best communites 
 protocols and products.
